batterychargetime: Approximately 2 hours when not in use.
cameradimensions: 166.2mm by 113.51mm x 126.49mm excluding detachable sunshade and turret dust cap
externalpower: 12V-30V DC port for external battery power or use included 12V AC adapter.
includedaccessories: Detachable sun shield, camera strap, turret dust cap and 12V AC adapter.
metadatasupport: Automatic camera data and user data such as shot number, filenames and keywords

speaker: Integrated mono speaker

power: Integrated Lithium-ion Polymer rechargeable battery. 12V-30V DC port for external battery power or use included 12V AC adapter.

shootingresolutions: 2.5K RAW at 2432 x 1366, compressed at 1920 x 1080

lensmount: EF mount compatible with automatic iris control
compressedrecordingformats: Apple ProRes and Avid DNxHD. All compressed recording in 1920x1080 10-bit YUV with choice of Film or Video Dynamic Range.
remotecontrol: 1 x 2.5mm LANC for Rec Start/Stop, Iris Control and Focus Control
computerinterface: Thunderbolt port for capture of RAW video and audio. USB 2.0 mini B port for software updates and configuration.
iriscontrol: Iris button automatically adjusts the lens iris settings so no pixel is clipped
mountingoptions: 3 x 1/4" thread mounting points on top of camera. 1 x 1/4" thread tripod mount with locator pin.
